title: 5 inventions that could transform the health of our ocean
body: 5 steps that could end the plastic pollution crisis - and save our ocean; How sustainable infrastructure can aid the post-COVID recovery; Discover. readable_content:
- This text presents potential solutions to address the issue of plastic waste in the ocean, including innovative ideas such as upcycling plastic waste, underwater robots for data collection, plastic dams, and waste drones.

- It discusses how organizations and startups are developing technologies to repurpose marine plastics, measure pollution in new ways, and capture plastic waste efficiently in various marine environments.

- The article highlights the urgency of addressing the issue, with the World Economic Forum emphasizing the need for sustainability at the heart of the COVID-19 recovery strategy.

- The innovative solutions discussed in the text aim to reduce the impact of plastic waste on the ocean and its marine life.
